218220a2-fefc-455b-9c17-a209930b8c60.description: The earner of this badge has completed one of the Microsoft Security Immersion Events, either Into the Breach or Shadow Hunter. Microsoft Security Immersion Events are a gamified learning experience where you can test your cybersecurity skills and come on top as the best Microsoft Security Agent in your class. This badge is a completion badge so that you can brag to your friends and colleagues that you found the attacker in our security environment.
218220a2-fefc-455b-9c17-a209930b8c60.name: Microsoft Security Immersion Completion Badge

issuer.summary: issued by Microsoft Security Partner Marketing Program

badge_template_activities.title: Our Microsoft Security Immersion Events: Into the Breach and Shadow Hunter are gamified learning experiences that test your cybersecurity skills. The Into the Breach Players investigate a ransomware attack on the Health Network. Dive into the simulation and apply your in-depth knowledge of Microsoft 365 Defender and Sentinel. In Shadow Hunter, utilize, Microsoft Defender for Cloud to detect threats on hybrid and multi-cloud workloads across Enterprise IoT, servers, containers, and databases.
